item.title: Hard Visuals - by Sniltsee [WIP, Project]
item.dc:creator: paxman
item.description:
That bow part is awesome. I changed it to orchestral strings, and I personally thought it sounded even better with violin pizzicato. But that was defintely my favorite part of the song. Only other suggestion I would have is to make your snare a little more prominent - the hi-hats are awesome. I rarely think about remixing songs, but while listening to this one I totally could imagine myself doing a remix. Keep up the amazing work.

Read full topic
